title: Here Comes Trouble
description:
Kambri Crews, David Balutanski, Allison Moon and Steve Heisler share stories of bad guys and brats.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Ja Prawn, David Balutanski, Steve Heisler, Kambri Crews, Allison Moon, Diagrams, Pinback, Kevin Allison, The Honey Brothers, Jeff Barr)
